name: df-risc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crisc, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crngo), wcel(cv(s1), crngo)), wex(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), crngiso, cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ~=R = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ RingOps ∧ s1 ∈ RingOps)∧ ∃(s2, s2 ∈(s0[RngIso]s1)))}
comment: Define the ring isomorphism relation. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
